  • Packages that use EnvironmentException 
    Package Description
    chav1961.purelib.basic.exceptions
    This package contains all exception definitions for the the library.
    chav1961.purelib.basic.interfaces
    This package contains all interfaces for the basic abilities of the library
    chav1961.purelib.fsys
    This package contains a set of FileSystemInterface implementations and a factory to get access to them.
    chav1961.purelib.i18n
    This package contains description of Pure Library internationalization classes.
    chav1961.purelib.json
    This package contains useful classes to operate with JSON format.

    This package contains a set of classes that implement CharacterSource interface

    This package contains a set of classes that implement CharacterTarget interface

    This package contains a set of interfaces to support stream processing of the different kinds
